ygData.subject: Re: Fletching
ygData.msgSnippet: Stormhugh, Ranger of the 11th Monsoon here. I too pursue my adventure in Norrath on Torv!. I started on the fletching trade, but have found archery to
ygData.messageBody:
Stormhugh, Ranger of the 11th Monsoon here. I too
pursue my adventure in Norrath on Torv!.<br><br>I
started on the fletching trade, but have found archery to
be cumbersome and frustrating in general (too much
stuff to cart around) and had a great time with a stack
of Shuriken I bought in Western Karana.<br><br>As a
human Ranger, I cut my teeth in the hills outside
Qeynos, then expended some rage on those pesky gnolls in
the Burrow. Visited the big folks to the North, but
their land is too dark and the ways too twisting at
night.<br><br>Since the plague took hold of the central plains, I
have hunted in the Karanas. This proved to be an
excellent locale to hunt and contemplate, as there were
rarely others around to disturb my enjoyment of the
great expanses. There are also many friendly wolves and
bears to see.<br><br>After an inept group of fellow
hunters cost be life and limb taking on a horde of
bandits, I decided to venture East and see other lands.
After a dangerous crossing of Highpass in great haste
of foot, I eventually reached Freeport and boarded a
vessel for a day's sail to Faydwer. I am looking for a
cache of weapons I heard rumor of (OOC: I died a
horrible death in Steamfont; must get back that Velium
Sword!), and then will collect Orc Belts for the friendly
Warriors in Kelethin.<br><br>Stormhugh, Ranger of the 11th
Monsoon, worshipper of Karana<br><br>(also steward of 5th
level gnome wiz Yenumstorm)
